title: RedWings1011
author: RedWings1011
content: Hi all.  I'm new here and have a question.  Someone recommended to me a platform to trade on called BTX platform.  I'm wondering if anyone has used this and have had issues depositing or withdrawing money from it.  Here is the link. https://cryptocurrencytradebitcored.comAny advice about it would be much appreciated.  Thanks!

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: It's a new exchange just launched last monthDomain:cryptocurrencytradebitcored.comRegistrar:NameSilo, LLCRegistered On:2022-07-17Expires On:2023-07-17Updated On:2022-07-17I don't think you can find many people who traded here because the majority of people trade on a more established exchange and I would not trade here and don't recommend you or anyone to trade here unless they start their announcement here and establish their reputation.It's funny how I think that you are part of this exchange in some way this is how promoters of new exchanges with hidden agendas do their stuff when it comes to marketing.

comments.author: RedWings1011
comments.body: Nah, I'm not part of it.   Someone I kinda know told me about it and I'm trying to see if it's legit or not.  They do ultra short term trading on it.

comments.author: zasad@
comments.body: Quote from: RedWings1011 on August 17, 2022, 12:59:35 PMNah, I'm not part of it.   Someone I kinda know told me about it and I'm trying to see if it's legit or not.  They do ultra short term trading on it.If you are really a beginner, then use the exchanges from this rating for tradinghttps://www.coingecko.com/en/exchangesIf you do not want to go through the KYC procedure, then you can use these exchangershttps://changelly.com/https://changenow.io/https://fixedfloat.com/I had no problems with it, although there are negative reviews on the net.The maximum exchange amount is $500 to start with(my recommendation is not to exceed this amount).

comments.author: RedWings1011
comments.body: Quote from: zasad@ on August 17, 2022, 01:12:47 PMQuote from: RedWings1011 on August 17, 2022, 12:59:35 PMI had no problems with it, although there are negative reviews on the net.The maximum exchange amount is $500 to start with(my recommendation is not to exceed this amount).You had no problems with the platform I linked?I'm not a beginner to crypto but I've never done ultra short term trading and I heard it can be profitable if you know what you're doing.  This is one of the exchanges that supposedly supports that trading but I wanted to make sure I could move my money freely if I were to use it.

comments.author: dimonstration
comments.body: Tell us what exactly what you want to hear from us? It seems you are desperate to sell this exchange for us to check it and probably attract on using it but most of the user will preferred to use those existing huge exchange like Binance rather than risk money on new exchange for whatever bonus or promo they are running. If you are not part of it and just want to know if it’s legit or not then the only thing you hear from people here in the forum was that exchange is new and not reputable so it only take 2 seconds to figure what is the risk involved by using it compared when you use proven exchange.

comments.author: RedWings1011
comments.body: Well if I can't ask a legit question about an exchange, I guess I'm at the wrong forum.  I have no anterior motives here.  I just wanted to see if anyone here has used or uses it since it's one I haven't heard of until recently. Thanks anyway...

comments.author: $crypto$
comments.body: Quote from: RedWings1011 on August 17, 2022, 01:51:17 PMWell if I can't ask a legit question about an exchange, I guess I'm at the wrong forum.  I have no anterior motives here.  I just wanted to see if anyone here has used or uses it since it's one I haven't heard of until recently. Thanks anyway...Obviously I don't think any users of this forum use the exchange so chances are they won't answer any deposits or withdrawals because every new exchange is always avoided if there is no credibility, I think you need to browse it safe or not for me this looks very shady his.I think you are not in the wrong forum because every question is always answered as is, so whether the exchange is legal or not you have to try it yourself at your own risk.

comments.author: TastyChillySauce00
comments.body: None used it. Even from the name of domain and it can be said that if it was a scam site. So, it's answering your question and it was also fixing the problem. I think that if you can start to avoid to deal with any site that used strange name like that. Some people may think if you wanna promoting it caused by it was a new site but don't mind it if you didn't wanna do that. Just never try to use it.

comments.author: fortunecrypto
comments.body: Quote from: RedWings1011 on August 17, 2022, 01:51:17 PMWell if I can't ask a legit question about an exchange, I guess I'm at the wrong forum.  I have no anterior motives here.  I just wanted to see if anyone here has used or uses it since it's one I haven't heard of until recently. Thanks anyway...You are on the right forum, its just so many newbies are promoting investment sites, casinos, and exchanges which are unheard of doing what you did asking if it's legal, and turns out they are part of the owner of those sites and just waiting for a new victim, you just have to check on Whois about its age and use the forum's search form or Google it, if you cannot find the site on the two, then its a new one, and are you willing to trade here?

comments.author: btc_angela
comments.body: Quote from: RedWings1011 on August 17, 2022, 12:59:35 PMNah, I'm not part of it.   Someone I kinda know told me about it and I'm trying to see if it's legit or not.  They do ultra short term trading on it.It's ok if you are not part of it, but remember majority here doesn't trade on a new exchange as they don't have the reputation yet. I'm not saying that it is going to scam you or what, but it's better safe that sorry.So my advise is, better stay away from that exchange for now, someone already posted some links that you can try beside the one that you are asking. Or maybe you can try it for yourself and give us your experience?

comments.author: Minecache
comments.body: Quote from: RedWings1011 on August 17, 2022, 12:43:37 PMHi all.  I'm new here and have a question.  Someone recommended to me a platform to trade on called BTX platform.  I'm wondering if anyone has used this and have had issues depositing or withdrawing money from it.  Here is the link. https://cryptocurrencytradebitcored.comAny advice about it would be much appreciated.  Thanks!You are a newbie and you are looking for a reputable exchange to start becoming a crypto trader?. First of all, welcome to the crypto world.As this is my first time hearing about this exchange, I can say that I am not confident in its reliability. Since you are a newbie it is always a pleasure to consult people before using or investing, we have a lot of top reputable exchanges here, you can choose one to use. https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges/Do not join new or strange exchanges, you will lose money unreasonably.

comments.author: Anonymous100
comments.body: Quote from: RedWings1011 on August 17, 2022, 12:43:37 PMHi all.  I'm new here and have a question.  Someone recommended to me a platform to trade on called BTX platform.  I'm wondering if anyone has used this and have had issues depositing or withdrawing money from it.  Here is the link. https://cryptocurrencytradebitcored.comAny advice about it would be much appreciated.  Thanks!Do you promote the exchange site in this forum? Questions do not necessarily lead to ignorance, but rather tell someone about what is being asked.The site is too complicated to remember. Looks like it's still very new, and needs to see further developments.I've never used this exchange, but based on the active date of the domain it looks very young. Why don't you use a more trusted exchange?

comments.author: sunsilk
comments.body: Bitcore(btx) seems to be a familiar project to me but I haven't visited that link you have given. As an individual on this market, we should set boundaries for anyone who tells us anything.We have to verify everything that anyone tells us and that's what you did.As for that exchange, I do not think that's related to the actual btx project and it is not enticing at all. Although the project itself is low volumed.

comments.author: inanilujimi
comments.body: Quote from: RedWings1011 on August 17, 2022, 12:43:37 PMHi all.  I'm new here and have a question.  Someone recommended to me a platform to trade on called BTX platform.  I'm wondering if anyone has used this and have had issues depositing or withdrawing money from it.  Here is the link. https://cryptocurrencytradebitcored.comAny advice about it would be much appreciated.  Thanks!I usually use an exchange platform that already has a good reputation and is popular with crypto enthusiasts. so why should you trade there? Is it because the altcoins you own are listed there and not listed elsewhere?

comments.author: jaberwock
comments.body: Quote from: RedWings1011 on August 17, 2022, 01:51:17 PMWell if I can't ask a legit question about an exchange, I guess I'm at the wrong forum.  I have no anterior motives here.  I just wanted to see if anyone here has used or uses it since it's one I haven't heard of until recently. As long as it is related to cryptos then you are in a right place to ask such question but you should only extend your patience or temper as some of the replies that you will see on here may not really be appropriate like they will think that you are part of the project that you are asking, something like that. That is true to some but for some it isn't. Ok fine, you have no bad motives, I believe you on that. Now about my comment with the exchange, I haven't tried using it and it is only my first time hearing it.You said it's also your first time and you feel sceptical about it? Well that is a good sign to leave the site alone. Don't wait until something bad happens to you and besides we still have other exchanges which are already tested and proven so why not use them instead?

comments.author: lobo13hf
comments.body: It seems like a fake site for me. The easiest to find the legit exchange sites through using coinmarketcap but the question is will you try to check it? some people have been even identifying if you are owner of that site caused by that doesn't make sense if you can't get a legit site easily. It takes only a few minutes to be able to know which was the most legit site to trade crypto and that site seems scammy sites from various aspects.
